wrong_file_type.other: Sorry I can only handle JPEG images at the moment. 😔 You sent me {{.Type}}.

locale_ru.other:
From now on I'll speak in russian. 
Ka-lin-ka, ma-lin-ka, ma-lin-ka mo-ya! 🇷🇺

locale_en.other:
From now on I'll speak english.
🤖 I'll be back! 🇺🇸

step_1_1.other: I'm an Instagram bot that allows you to post photos to your Instagram account automatically adding caption, #hashtags and different styles.

step_1_2.other: As I am a demo bot, I'll post only 3 photos from you to this demo Instagram account: {{.DemoInstagram}}

step_1_3.other: To start just send me a photo and see what happens. 😉

publish_ok.other: Yay! Your photo has been queued for publishing!

publish_err.other:
🚫 Unfortunately something broke and I couldn't publish your photo.
Here's what went wrong: {{.Error}}

caption_ready.other: Hey, it looks like this is the photo is all about: {{.Caption}}

all_fields_ready.other: Hey, it looks like everything's ready for publish: {{.Info}}

published.other: ✅ Done! You can see your photo here: {{.Url}}

nsfw_detected.other: Woopsie! 🤭 It looks like you've tried to publish something that should remain private. I won't post this as it's too mature for my demo account, 👯‍ sorry. Try a different photo, please! 😇

demo_end_1.other: Hey, I'm really sorry but you've already posted your free 3 photos.

demo_end_2.other: If you'd like to post more, please see here on how to get more: {{.LandingUrl}}
